select-by-config.name: config.sam0.drivers.gpio
select-by-config.caption: GPIO - GPIO Pin Control for SAMB

module.caption: GPIO - GPIO Pin Control for SAMB (Polled APIs)
module.info: Driver for the SAM GPIO module. Provides a unified interface for the configuration and management of the physical device GPIO pins, including input/output state control.
This document describes how to use the GPIO Controller on the SAMB11, both the ASF driver and the peripheral itself.

module.caption: GPIO - GPIO Pin Control for SAMB (Callback APIs)
module.info: Driver for the SAM GPIO module. Provides a unified interface for the configuration and management of the physical device GPIO pins, including input/output state control.
This document describes how to use the GPIO Controller on the SAMB11, both the ASF driver and the peripheral itself.
